title: Can't log in anywhere, and reset email's not working
body:
After a ranked my client closed after a pop up told me my account was logged into from another computer. Neither the password reset or the account name recovery emails sent me an email, and they're not in my spam folder. My friend told me I disappeared from his friends list, so I'm not sure if this is related to the authentication errors from earlier today.

I opened a ticket, but I can't check the status on it without logging in? That doesn't make sense. When I try to check the status on it through the link in the email with this account, it says it can't find the page. 

All of this happened after I purchased $100 worth of RP. {{item:3070}}

Edit: The account name is Bryantos

replies.body:
If the client told you that your account had been logged in from another computer, that means that someone else has access to your account. They signed into your account, and since you can only be logged into an account on one pc at a time it kicked you out. 

I checked for your ticket, but it doesn't look like Bryantos or this account has submitted any tickets yet. I do see that you reached out to our Twitter support, but we won't be able to handle account security there. I'd strongly suggest you hit up our account specialists through the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) as soon as you can to secure your account!

I have an email saying my ticket was submitted through that form already, but when I tried to visit the link in the e-mail, it said the page didn't exist. Is it possible for whoever gained access to delete the ticket? I'll submit another one.

I was able to solve my issue through live chat. Thanks for your help, Broporo!

Verify your e-mail, kids!
